import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import axios from'axios';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import Navigation from'./Navigation';import'./Dashboard.css';// Ensure to import CSS
import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Dashboard=_ref=>{let{handleLogout}=_ref;const[user,setUser]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{const fetchData=async()=>{try{const token=localStorage.getItem('token');if(token){const res=await axios.get('https://mern-project-5-xoai.onrender.com/api/auth/dashboard',{headers:{'Authorization':"Bearer ".concat(token)}});setUser(res.data.user);}}catch(err){console.error(err);}};fetchData();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigation,{handleLogout:handleLogout}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"content",children:user?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Welcome, ",user.name,"!"]}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Loading..."})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/browse-products",className:"button",children:"Browse Products"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/sell",className:"button",children:"Become a Seller"})]})]});};export default Dashboard;
